page.title: 17ELECTRONIC & COMPUTER GAMES
page.content:
Many of the popular{electronic games are{space orientated}where the aim of the games is to blow up aliens, planets or spacecraft. Some are portable and hand held. Andrew's favourite game is{'Death Star {Interceptor'}which is one such game.
******** { { 'Manic Miner'}is a popular{computer {game}where a miner aims to get through or over several obstacles at various levels of difficulty which take him deeper into the mine.
******** {'Roland Rat Race'}is another popular {computer game}based on a television character. The aim of the game is to avoid or to get past dangerous obstacles on a journey through the sewers to rescue his friends.
